application.name: Turpial
application.summary: A light, beautiful and functional microblogging client

description.p: Turpial is a lightweight and beautiful microblogging client written in Python.

ul.li: Support for multiple accounts and multiple columns
With filters to control your timeline content
Messages queue to post tweets while your "work"
Light and fast, with a low resources consumption
With image preview for lots of services
It doesn't harm the ozone layer
